snippet.title: Sky: Children of the Light | Nintendo Switch Announcement
snippet.description:
thatgamecompany and Nintendo are delighted to announce that 'Sky: Children of the Light' will kickstart its console release on Nintendo Switch.  It is slated for a 2020 release. For more information, head towards: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/sky-children-of-the-light-switch/

Sky is available on the iOS App Store: http://bit.ly/PlaySkyiOS
Sky on Google Play will launch in April 2020: http://bit.ly/PreregisterSky

Visit our website thatskygame.com, and stay tuned for more news via our social media:
https://twitter.com/thatskygame
https://www.facebook.com/thatskygame
https://www.instagram.com/thatskygame
  
Join the conversation with #thatskygame
